name: Camp Unalayee
description: Located in Northern California’s Trinity Alps, the non-profit, wilderness summer camp provides meaningful outdoor experiences for children ages 10-17. Whether boating, backpacking, making crafts or learning leadership skills, campers learn how to safely enjoy a remarkably beautiful wilderness setting.

address: 3921 East Bayshore Road , Palo Alto, CA, 94303
